subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sergio García picked up his first European victory in more than three years on his home course and dedicated the three-shot victory at the Castello Masters to the hospitalized Seve Ballesteros. García had a four-under-par 67 for a total of 20-under 264 at the Club de Campo del Mediterraneo golf course in Castellon, Spain.
